case.state: All right let's get this going.

You're enjoying that as much as I'm enjoying winning.
I must admit, that looks kinda fun.
I'm the best at this game.
I really just want to teleport away if you keep doing that.
You could've shot further, you're not even trying.
If you feel like losing again, give me a call.
I'm the best at this game.
Wow! I'm kind of excited to see under your ~clothing~...
All right let's get this going.
Whoa whoa whoa! What are you doing?!
Give it up, you won't win anyway...
You're enjoying that as much as I'm enjoying winning.

Not even Trigon could beat this hand.
I should be fine... If Beast Boy really knows the rules like he claimed.
We get a second draw, right?
Oh no... I have to remove my boots...
I guess this had to happen eventually.
Did it ever occur to you to practice the actual game instead of your stupid victory dance...?
I've seen Zone-tan strip naked for me way more often than anyone could imagine... Please get her out of my life...
Hrmmmm... (why do I still find her so fucking hot...?)
You gotta take something off, girl...
Must be embarrassing standing here all naked.
How are you so hard already? It's throbbing!

You're kind of cute like that...
Well... I tried to warn you...
I'm the best at this game.
There we go... here we go...
Just another figment of my imagination, don't even look.
You seemed to enjoy that more than I did.
This game is finally paying off.
Come on, we have to keep it moving or we'll never get to the good part.
I knew I was the best at this.
The chances that you will win are quite slim, so you might as well get naked right now...
Was this worth seeing me without my boots on?
These cards are as dark as my powers.

You left your front door open...

I'm going back to the tower...
Starfire would be surprised by the size of those!

I've seen Zone-tan strip naked for me way more often than anyone could imagine... Please get her out of my life...

A little closer than I would've liked, but I still won.
Was it worth it just to see my face?

Don't worry, It's not the first time I've watched this... might be the first time they've known about it though.

epilogue.gender: "male", "female", or "any". This is the gender of player that can see the ending
epilogue.title: This is the title of the character's ending, and the start of a new ending

screen.img: filename (including extension) of the background image for a screen. Also the start of a new screen

text.x: The x-position of the text box. Specifically, the position of the text box's left side. This can be a percentage, or the word "centered"
text.y: The y-position of the top of the text box. Must be a percentage.
text.width: The width of a text box. This is optional. Must be a percentage.
text.arrow: "up", "down", "left", or "right". Gives the text box a dialogue arrow in the specified direction. Can be left out, if you don't want the text box to be an arrow.
text.content: The text in the text box.
This is text that will be seen by the player. It has a width of 34% and an arrow pointing down.
This is a centered text box. It has the default width and an arrow pointing right.
This third text box has minimum amount of values specified. It uses the default width, and has no arrow.
